{}.response: To retrieve new titles, please provide both a start_date and an end_date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. This allows the API to generate a list of title IDs for titles that have been added to the streaming services within the specified date range. Once you have the list of new title IDs, you can use the /v1/title/ endpoint to get more detailed information about each title, such as the title name, description, cast, directors, ratings, availability on streaming platforms, and other relevant metadata.
